single.label: Pay schedule
single.description: The pay schedule to use for all employees.

hourlySalaried.hourlyDescription: Select a pay schedule for hourly, salaried non-exempt, and commission-only non-exempt employees.
hourlySalaried.salariedDescription: Select a pay schedule for salaried and commission-only exempt employees.

byDepartment.uncategorizedDescription: Select a pay schedule for employees who aren't assigned to any department.
